terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to DormHub. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you may not use DormHub.
terms.section1Content:
By creating an account and using DormHub, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. These terms apply to all users of the platform, including those who browse, post listings, submit tips, or engage with local businesses featured on our platform.

DormHub reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of significant changes via email or through the platform. Your continued use of DormHub after such modifications constitutes your acceptance of the updated terms.
terms.section2Content:
You must be at least 18 years old to use DormHub. By creating an account, you represent and warrant that you are of legal age and have the right, authority, and capacity to enter into this agreement.

You are responsible for:
• Maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
• All activities that occur under your account
• Ensuring your account information is accurate and up-to-date
• Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized access

You may not:
• Create multiple accounts
• Share your account with others
• Use another person's account without permission
• Create an account using false or misleading information
terms.section3Content:
DormHub's marketplace is a peer-to-peer platform for dorm residents. Users agree to:

Prohibited Items and Content:
• No illegal items, drugs, weapons, or counterfeit goods
• No stolen property or items obtained illegally
• No adult content, offensive material, or hate speech
• No spam, scams, or misleading information
• No items that violate intellectual property rights

Accurate Listings:
• Provide truthful, accurate descriptions of items
• Use real photos of your actual items
• Price items fairly and honor stated prices
• Update or remove listings when items are sold
• Respond to inquiries in a timely manner

User Conduct:
• Treat other users with respect
• No harassment, threats, or abusive behavior
• No impersonation of others
• Complete transactions in good faith
• Meet in safe, public locations for exchanges
terms.section4Content:
Users may submit tips and advice for the community. By submitting content, you:

• Grant DormHub a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide license to use, display, and distribute your content
• Warrant that your content is original or you have the right to share it
• Agree that content may be moderated, edited, or removed
• Understand that tips require approval before being published

Content Guidelines:
• Must be helpful, relevant, and appropriate for the community
• No profanity, offensive language, or personal attacks
• No false, misleading, or harmful information
• No advertising or self-promotion
• No copyright violations or plagiarism

DormHub reserves the right to reject, remove, or edit any content that violates these guidelines or is deemed inappropriate.

Important Disclaimers:

Business owners who wish to update their information should contact us directly.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At DormHub, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information when you use our platform. By using DormHub, you consent to the practices described in this policy.
privacy.section1Content:
Personal Information:
When you create an account on DormHub, we collect:
• Full name
• Email address
• Phone number (optional)
• Dorm/room location (for marketplace functionality)
• Profile information you choose to provide

Automatically Collected Information:
• IP address and device information
• Browser type and version
• Pages visited and time spent on the platform
• Referring/exit pages
• Operating system
• Login timestamps

User-Generated Content:
• Marketplace listings (title, description, images, price, location)
• Tips and advice submitted to the community
• Comments, votes, and interactions
• Favorites and saved items
• Reports of inappropriate content

Third-Party Authentication:
We use Clerk for authentication, which may collect:
• OAuth tokens from social media providers (Google, Apple, Facebook)
• Authentication metadata

Note: We minimize data collection and only collect what is necessary to provide our services.
privacy.section2Content:
We use your information for the following purposes:

Core Services:
• Account creation and authentication
• Displaying your listings on the marketplace
• Enabling communication between buyers and sellers
• Publishing approved tips and content
• Providing access to local business information

Platform Improvement:
• Analyzing usage patterns to improve user experience
• Monitoring platform performance and fixing bugs
• Understanding which features are most valuable
• Preventing fraud and abuse

Communication:
• Sending important account updates and security alerts
• Notifying you of responses to your listings or tips
• Responding to your support requests
• Announcing new features or updates (you can opt out)

Safety and Compliance:
• Investigating reports of policy violations
• Moderating content for appropriateness
• Preventing spam, fraud, and abuse
• Complying with legal obligations

We will never:
• Sell your personal information to third parties
• Share your data for marketing purposes without consent
• Use your information for purposes not disclosed here
privacy.section3Content:
We use trusted third-party services to operate DormHub:

Clerk (Authentication):
• Manages user authentication and account security
• Handles OAuth integrations with Google, Apple, Facebook
• Privacy Policy: https://clerk.com/legal/privacy

Supabase (Database and Storage):
• Stores user data, listings, tips, and images
• Hosts our database infrastructure
• Privacy Policy: https://supabase.com/privacy

Vercel (Hosting):
• Hosts and serves the DormHub platform
• Provides infrastructure and performance monitoring
• Privacy Policy: https://vercel.com/legal/privacy-policy

When We May Share Information:
• With your explicit consent
• To comply with legal obligations (court orders, subpoenas)
• To protect the rights, property, or safety of DormHub, our users, or others
• In connection with a business transfer (merger, acquisition, sale)
• With service providers bound by confidentiality agreements

Public Information:
• Marketplace listings are visible to all users
• Approved tips are publicly visible
• Your username/display name is visible on your content
• You control what information you include in listings and tips
privacy.section4Content:
Security Measures:
We implement industry-standard security practices:
• Encryption of data in transit (HTTPS/TLS)
• Secure authentication through Clerk
• Database access controls and Row Level Security (RLS)
• Regular security audits and updates
• Secure storage of user credentials
• Limited access to personal data by staff

Data Retention:
• Active account data: Retained while your account is active
• Deleted content: Removed from public view immediately, permanently deleted after 30 days
• Closed accounts: Data deleted within 90 days of account closure
• Legal requirements: Some data may be retained longer if required by law
• Backup copies: May persist in backups for up to 90 days

Your Responsibilities:
• Use a strong, unique password
• Keep your credentials confidential
• Log out on shared devices
• Report suspicious activity immediately
• Be cautious about what information you share in listings

Data Breaches:
In the unlikely event of a data breach, we will:
• Investigate and contain the incident immediately
• Notify affected users within 72 hours
• Report to relevant authorities as required by law
• Take steps to prevent future incidents
privacy.section5Content:
You have the following rights regarding your personal information:

Access and Portability:
• View your account information at any time
• Request a copy of your data in a portable format
• Export your listings and content

Correction and Updates:
• Update your profile information
• Edit or delete your listings
• Correct inaccurate information

Deletion (Right to be Forgotten):
• Delete individual listings or tips
• Request full account deletion
• We will delete your data within 90 days of request
• Some information may be retained for legal compliance

Optional Data:
• Phone number is optional - you can choose not to provide it
• You control what information appears in your listings
• You can make listings anonymous

Communication Preferences:
• Opt out of non-essential emails
• Control notification settings
• Choose how you want to be contacted

How to Exercise Your Rights:
• Email us at: [your contact email]
• Contact us via WhatsApp: +972-52-727-5393
• Use the account settings page
• We will respond to requests within 30 days
privacy.section6Content:
Cookies and Tracking:
• We use essential cookies for authentication and security
• Session cookies to keep you logged in
• Preference cookies to remember your settings
• Analytics cookies to understand usage (you can opt out)
• We do not use advertising or tracking cookies

Third-Party Analytics:
• We may use Vercel Analytics to monitor performance
• Analytics data is anonymized and aggregated
• You can opt out through your browser settings

GDPR Compliance (for EU/EEA users):
If you are in the European Union or European Economic Area, you have additional rights:
• Right to access your personal data
• Right to rectification of inaccurate data
• Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten")
• Right to restrict processing
• Right to data portability
• Right to object to processing
• Right to withdraw consent at any time
• Right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority

Legal Basis for Processing:
• Contract: To provide services you requested
• Legitimate Interest: To improve and secure our platform
• Consent: For optional features and communications
• Legal Obligation: To comply with applicable laws

International Data Transfers:
• Your data may be processed outside your country of residence
• We use appropriate safeguards for international transfers
• Third-party services comply with GDPR and privacy regulations

Children's Privacy:
• DormHub is not intended for users under 18
• We do not knowingly collect data from minors
• If we discover underage users, we will delete their accounts

Contact Information:
For privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights:
• WhatsApp: +972-52-727-5393
• Email: [Your contact email]

This Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes and post the updated policy with a new "Last Updated" date.
